tasks.title: Initialize project structure
tasks.description: Create cli-todo-app directory with package.json, tsconfig.json, and folder structure (src/, bin/, dist/). Initialize with npm init and install dependencies: typescript, esbuild, chalk, commander, and @types/node.

tasks.title: Implement types and storage module
tasks.description: Create src/types.ts with Todo interface. Create src/storage.ts with functions: loadTodos(), saveTodos(), getStoragePath(). Storage should use ~/.todo/todos.json with auto-creation of directory.

tasks.title: Implement color utilities
tasks.description: Create src/utils/colors.ts with chalk-based helpers: formatTodo(), formatSuccess(), formatError(), formatId(). Create src/utils/time.ts with relativeTime() function for 'just now', '2 hours ago', etc.

tasks.title: Implement add command
tasks.description: Create src/commands/add.ts that adds a new todo with auto-incrementing ID, sets done=false, createdAt to current ISO timestamp. Show success message with colored output.

tasks.title: Implement list command
tasks.description: Create src/commands/list.ts that displays all todos with colored output. Show count header, pending items in yellow, completed in green with checkmark, IDs in cyan, timestamps in dim.

tasks.title: Implement done command
tasks.description: Create src/commands/done.ts that marks a todo as completed by ID. Set done=true and completedAt timestamp. Show error if ID not found, success message on completion.

tasks.title: Implement remove command
tasks.description: Create src/commands/remove.ts that deletes a todo by ID. Show error if ID not found, success message on deletion.

tasks.title: Implement clear command
tasks.description: Create src/commands/clear.ts that removes all completed todos. Show count of removed items.

tasks.title: Implement CLI entry point
tasks.description: Create src/index.ts with commander setup. Register all commands: add, list (default), done, remove, clear. Add version and help options. Create bin/todo executable entry.

tasks.title: Configure build and test
tasks.description: Add build script using esbuild to bundle src/index.ts to dist/todo.js with shebang. Add npm scripts: build, start. Test all commands work end-to-end.
